name: The Last Kiln (ryankann)
description:
Entry for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam. Centered around the Only One theme, we decided to apply that to the aesthetics of the game. You are the only living flame left in the world, and must get to the fabled Last Kiln, the flame equivalent of Elysium.

In addition, we decided to make the game consist of only one puzzle type: buttons, doors and boxes, with a variation each time to test our creativity in designing levels out of very limited options.

Created by: 

Ryan Kann

https://ryankann.itch.io/

Jordan Fuentes

https://coover55.itch.io/

https://twitter.com/imCoover
